Package calc

Class Calculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • calc.Calculator
  • public abstract class Calculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Calculator This class will take care of the arithmetic operations (such as addition, subtraction, etc...) for our RPN calculator. Not mutable class

      • calculate

        protected static java.math.BigDecimal calculate​(java.math.BigDecimal x,
                                                java.math.BigDecimal y,
                                                char op)
        Calculates the operation between x and y, with the operator op as : x op y Removes the excess decimal zeros
        Parameters:
        x - BigDecimal
        y - BigDecimal
        op - operator ['+', '-', '*', '/']
        Returns:
        the result of the calculation In case the op was not verified, then this function will throw an exception
